name: The Road Out
description:
The Road Out is a slightly depressing dystopian fantasy text-based adventure game. It is about the crack between two races; humans and gremlins, and about fixing society and making sacrifices. It has little or no combat. You are a knight who wants glory by slaying the gremlin general. But you may understand his side. He just wants a place in society, but he is outcast. Enter a Mage who was outcast from the city due to a misunderstanding originating with you, the knight. Try to make friends, or alternatively--kill him and kill the gremlin general, and get all the glory possible.
 More of this game and world will come in the near future.
